dimension: 26 1/2 x 28 1/16 in. (67.31 x 71.28 cm) (without trim or tassels)
title: Ceremonial napkin
description: two panels sewn together; white with central band of multicolored flowers and orange birds with blue wings; multicolored checkered bands at top and bottom; white crocheted trim at top and bottom with orange and blue tassels
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
